name: JFCS Food Pantry
description: Jewish Family and Children's Services (JFCS) operates a food pantry providing high-protein, nutritious food to seniors, disabled adults, and low-income families in Santa Clara County.
fullDescription: Jewish Family and Children's Services (JFCS) operates a food pantry providing high-protein, nutritious food to seniors, disabled adults, and low-income families in Santa Clara County.
whatTheyOffer:
- High-protein nutritious food boxes
- Available for seniors on fixed income
- Serves disabled adults and low-income families
- Kosher options available
- Culturally sensitive food choices
howToGetIt: Contact JFCS to learn about eligibility and how to access the food pantry. Services available to Santa Clara County residents.
